name: shortcut
description: is extended from Widget and PushPop, and it hide in someplace in normal status. When user needed it, it can slide into viewport with different direction or style. And, `Bottle` will make sure only one shortcut widget displayed in the same time.

data-attrs.name: mask
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating ShortCut requires mask when show.

data-attrs.name: cfg-sc-trans
data-attrs.description: Specify show/hide transition configuration in JSON format.

data-attrs.name: full-height
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating ShortCut requires adjusting height to match viewport.
data-attrs.default: true when data-show-from is left or right, false when data-show-from is top or bottom

data-attrs.name: full-width
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating ShortCut requires adjusting width to match viewport.
data-attrs.default: false when data-show-from is left or right, true when data-show-from is top or bottom
